snippet: The arrests came a day after a deadly bombing in Bahrain’s capital, a sharp intensification of the violence that has simmered in the island nation since the beginning of a pro-democracy uprising 21 months ago.
abstract: Four suspects are arrested in connection with deadly bombings in Bahrain; authorities say Shiite militant group Hezbollah may have played a role.
lead_paragraph: The arrests came a day after a deadly bombing in Bahrain’s capital, a sharp intensification of the violence that has simmered in the island nation since the beginning of a pro-democracy uprising 21 months ago.

headline.main: Bahrain: Four Arrested in Bombings; Officials Hint at Hezbollah Role
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Four Arrested in Bombings; Officials Hint at Hezbollah Role

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
